title: A Matter of time
creator_credit: Arthur Allan Seidelman, Martin Lahse and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Based on a novel by Roni Schotter, this film chronicles a 16-year-old girl’s painful period of growth as she confronts her mother’s inevitable death from a malignant tumor. In the process, she emerges from behind her mother’s shadow and discovers her own special talent. Cast includes Karlene Crocket, Rob Lowe, Rosemary Forsythe, Carrie Freeman, Kate Bentall, Malcolm Groome.
